name: Repeated Customers
query:
SELECT
    `Date`,
    `Total Customers`,
    `New Customers`,
    `Total Customers`-`New Customers` AS `Repeated Customers`,
    ROUND(((`Total Customers`-`New Customers`) / `Total Customers`)*100,2)  AS Percentage
FROM
    (SELECT
    date_list.`date` AS `Date`,
    COUNT(d.customer) AS `Total Customers`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.customer IS NOT NULL THEN b.customer END) AS `New Customers`
    FROM 
    (
        SELECT %(start_date)s AS `date`
        UNION
        SELECT DATE_ADD(%(start_date)s, INTERVAL n DAY) AS `date`
        FROM (
            SELECT a.N + b.N * 10 + c.N * 100 + 1 AS n
            FROM (
                SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9
            ) AS a
            CROSS JOIN (
                SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9
            ) AS b
            CROSS JOIN (
                SELECT 0 AS N UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9
            ) AS c
            ORDER BY n
        ) AS nums
        WHERE DATE_ADD(%(start_date)s, INTERVAL n DAY) < %(end_date)s
        UNION
        SELECT %(end_date)s AS `date`
    ) AS date_list
    LEFT JOIN `tabPOS Invoice` d ON (
        d.`branch` = %(branch)s
        AND d.`status` IN ("Consolidated","Paid") 
        AND d.`docstatus` = 1
    )
    LEFT JOIN `tabPOS Invoice` b ON (
        b.`name` = d.`name`
        AND b.`branch` = %(branch)s
        AND b.`status` IN ("Consolidated", "Paid")
        AND b.`docstatus` = 1
        AND NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM `tabPOS Invoice` c
            LEFT JOIN `tabURY Report Settings` rs ON (
                rs.`branch` = %(branch)s
            )
            WHERE
                (
                    ((rs.`hours` IS NULL OR rs.`hours` = 0) IS NULL AND c.`posting_date` < date_list.`date`)
                    OR (rs.`hours` > 0 AND TIMESTAMP(c.`posting_date`, c.`posting_time`) < TIMESTAMP(date_list.`date`, CONCAT(LPAD(rs.`hours`, 2, '0'), ':00:00')))
                    OR (rs.`branch` IS NULL AND c.`posting_date` < da(rs.`hours` IS NULL OR rs.`hours` = 0)te_list.`date`)
                )
                AND c.`customer` = b.`customer`
                AND c.`branch` = %(branch)s
                AND c.`status` IN ("Consolidated", "Paid")
                AND c.`docstatus` = 1
        )
    )
    LEFT JOIN `tabURY Report Settings` rs ON (
        rs.`branch` = %(branch)s
    )
    WHERE
    (
        ((rs.`hours` IS NULL OR rs.`hours` = 0) IS NULL AND d.`posting_date` = date_list.`date`)
        OR (rs.`hours` > 0 AND TIMESTAMP(d.`posting_date`, d.`posting_time`) <= TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(date_list.`date`, INTERVAL 1 DAY), CONCAT(LPAD(rs.`hours`, 2, '0'), ':00:00')) AND TIMESTAMP(d.`posting_date`, d.`posting_time`) >= TIMESTAMP(date_list.`date`, CONCAT(LPAD(rs.`hours`, 2, '0'), ':00:00')))
        OR (rs.`branch` IS NULL AND d.`posting_date` = date_list.`date`)
    )
    GROUP BY 
        date_list.`date`
    ORDER BY 
        date_list.`date` DESC) AS subquery;
